properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 6 at 8:55PM CST until February 7 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...LIGHT SNOW POSSIBLE THIS EVENING AND OVERNIGHT...

.A quick moving weather system will continue to bring light snows
to western Kentucky and part of southwestern Indiana this evening
and overnight. Minor accumulations of snow up to 1 inch are
possible. As temperatures slip below freezing through the evening,
some slick spots may develop on roads.

* WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch.

* WHERE...Graves County.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 8 AM CST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions in some areas. The
hazardous conditions could impact evening school activities and
the Friday morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will fall below freezing in
the evening. Impacts on area roads will become more of a
concern from mid evening on into the overnight hours.
properties.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling tonight.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM CST FRIDAY
